Proxy.name: PointLocator
Proxy.Documentation: Point locator based on a search structure of uniform fixed-resolution bins / buckets for point location and generic (zero or non-zero) tolerance point insertion.

IntVectorProperty.name: Divisions
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Specify the number of divisions in each axis / direction (x, y, z) for creating a search structure of uniform fixed-resolution bins / buckets.

IntVectorProperty.label: Number of points per bucket
IntVectorProperty.name: NumberOfPointsPerBucket
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Specify the average number of points in each bin / bucket that determines the initial and growing sizes (in terms of number of points) of each bin / bucket.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: Tolerance
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: Specify an absolute tolerance for check-based / tolerance-based point insertion.

Proxy.label: Uniform Binning
Proxy.name: MergePoints
Proxy.Documentation: A point merger using a search structure of uniform fixed-resolution bins / buckets for zero tolerance point insertion (to avoid exactly duplicate / coincident points).

IntVectorProperty.name: Divisions
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Specify the number of divisions in each axis / direction (x, y, z) for creating a search structure of uniform fixed-resolution bins / buckets.

IntVectorProperty.label: Number of points per bucket
IntVectorProperty.name: NumberOfPointsPerBucket
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Specify the average number of points in each bin / bucket that determines the initial and growing sizes (in terms of number of points) of each bin / bucket.

Proxy.label: Don't Merge Points
Proxy.name: NonMergingPointLocator
Proxy.Documentation: Perform direct / check-free point insertion (any point is inserted to a vtkPoints object) and therefore there can be duplicate points.

IntVectorProperty.name: Divisions
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Specify the number of divisions in each axis / direction (x, y, z) for creating a search structure of uniform fixed-resolution bins / buckets.

IntVectorProperty.label: Number of points per bucket
IntVectorProperty.name: NumberOfPointsPerBucket
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Specify the average number of points in each bin / bucket that determines the initial and growing sizes (in terms of number of points) of each bin / bucket.

Proxy.name: IncrementalOctreePointLocator
Proxy.Documentation: Point locator based on a fast search structure of data-aware multi-resolution octree nodes for point location and generic (zero or non-zero) tolerance point insertion.

IntVectorProperty.label: Max number of points per leaf
IntVectorProperty.name: MaxPointsPerLeaf
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Specify the maximum number of points that a leaf node may maintain. This value is a trade-off between the cost of dynamic octree construction (top-down recursive node sub-division into eight children as points are incrementally inserted to the octree) and the speed of point location (particularly within a container leaf node).

DoubleVectorProperty.name: Tolerance
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: Specify an absolute tolerance for check-based / tolerance-based point insertion.

Proxy.label: Octree Binning
Proxy.name: IncrementalOctreeMergePoints
Proxy.Documentation: A point merger exploiting a fast search structure of data-aware multi-resolution octree nodes for zero-tolerance point insertion (to avoid exactly duplicate / coincident points).

IntVectorProperty.label: Max number of points per leaf
IntVectorProperty.name: MaxPointsPerLeaf
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Specify the maximum number of points that a leaf node may maintain. This value is a trade-off between the cost of dynamic octree construction (top-down recursive node sub-division into eight children as points are incrementally inserted to the octree) and the speed of point location (particularly within a container leaf node).

DoubleVectorProperty.name: Tolerance
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: Always specify a zero tolerance for point insertion --- merging points.

Proxy.name: StaticPointLocator
Proxy.label: Static Point Locator
Proxy.Documentation:
This uses a spatial search object to quickly locate points in 3D. This locator works by dividing a specified region of space into a regular array of cuboid buckets, and then keeping a list of points that lie in each bucket. Typical operation involves giving a position in 3D and finding the closest point; or finding the N closest points.
This locator is an accelerated version of a point locator. It is threaded (via vtkSMPTools), and supports one-time static construction (i.e., incremental point insertion is not supported).

IntVectorProperty.name: Automatic
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Controls whether the locator resolution is computed automatically or not.

IntVectorProperty.name: Divisions
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Specify the number of divisions in each axis / direction (x, y, z) for creating a search structure of uniform fixed-resolution bins / buckets.

IntVectorProperty.name: NumberOfPointsPerBucket
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Specify the average number of points in each bucket. This is used in conjunction with the **Automatic** (if enabled) to determine the number of locator x-y-z divisions.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: QuadricCoefficients
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: Coefficients of the quadric function, defined as the 'a' values in: F(x,y,z) = a0*x^2 + a1*y^2 + a2*z^2 + a3*x*y + a4*y*z + a5*x*z + a6*x + a7*y + a8*z + a9

DoubleVectorProperty.name: Center
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the center of the sphere.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: Radius
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the radius of the sphere.

StringVectorProperty.name: ActiveFileName
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the filename whose information we need.

StringVectorProperty.name: WorkingDirectory
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Override the working directory used to resolve relative paths.

IntVectorProperty.name: ReadDetailedFileInformation
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Whether to read full file information. This is slow when there are many files in a directory so this defaults to false.

StringVectorProperty.name: ActiveFileName
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the filename we need to use.

StringVectorProperty.name: SecondaryFileName
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the secondary filename we may need to use.

IntVectorProperty.name: ActiveGlobalId
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the globalId of the vtkObject to use

TimeKeeperProxy.name: TimeKeeper
TimeKeeperProxy.Documentation: TimeKeeper is used to keep the pipeline time for the application. All views added to the timekeeper show the same time as that on the time keeper.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: TimestepValues
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: The timesteps currently available. This property does not have any information helper since vtkSMTimeKeeperProxy keeps this updated without any need to call UpdatePropertyInformation().

DoubleVectorProperty.name: TimeRange
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: This is the time range. It's possible that there are no TimestepValues but there is a valid TimeRange since some sources may provide continuous time.

StringVectorProperty.name: TimeLabel
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: This is the string that is used as label to eventually replace "time" by something else such as "frequency" or any user specific label that the user want to set to use a 4th dimension that is not time.

ProxyProperty.name: Views
ProxyProperty.Documentation: Views with their view time linked with this time keeper.

ProxyProperty.name: TimeSources
ProxyProperty.Documentation: List of proxies that provide time. TimestepValues property has a set of timesteps provided by all the sources added to this property alone.

ProxyProperty.name: SuppressedTimeSources
ProxyProperty.Documentation: List of proxies that are to suppressed i.e their times to be ignored.

PluginLoaderProxy.name: PluginLoader
PluginLoaderProxy.Documentation: Use this proxy to load a plugin remotely. This proxy has no properties that users can set. Only information-properties are provided that can be used to obtain various states. vtkSMPluginLoaderProxy has API that can be used to load plugins, configuration xmls etc.

Proxy.name: TimerLog
Proxy.Documentation: This is a proxy used to control the timer log parameters on all processes. Note that since vtkTimerLog has loads of static ivar, most properties will affect all timer log instances.

Property.name: ResetLog
Property.Documentation: Resets the log on all processes.

IntVectorProperty.name: Enable
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Enables the timer-log on all processes.

IntVectorProperty.name: MaxEntries
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the maximum length for the log on all processes.

IntVectorProperty.name: RankEnabled
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Set rank to enable logging.

IntVectorProperty.name: RankDisabled
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Set rank to disable logging.

IntVectorProperty.name: Verbosity
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Set verbosity of desired log entries.

IntVectorProperty.name: CategoryVerbosity
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the verbosity of a specific ParaView logging category.

SourceProxy.name: RemoteWriterHelper
SourceProxy.Documentation: Proxy used internally to help write data generated on the client-side on the data-server side.

Proxy.name: CatalystOptions
Proxy.Documentation: Catalyst options that affect the script execution when running in situ.

StringVectorProperty.name: ExtractsOutputDirectory
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Choose directory under which to save all extracts.

IntVectorProperty.name: GenerateCinemaSpecification
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Generate Cinema specification to summarize generated extracts in a file named **data.csv** under the **Extracts Output Directory**.

IntVectorProperty.name: EnableCatalystLive
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Enable Catalyst Live which allows connecting to a Catalyst instrumented simulation using the ParaView GUI.

StringVectorProperty.name: CatalystLiveURL
StringVectorProperty.label: Catalyst Live URL
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Specify the hostname (or IP address) and port for the node on which a ParaView client will be listening for Catalyst Live connections.

Proxy.name: CatalystGlobalOptions
Proxy.Documentation: A proxy used to maintain global Catalyst state. This, combined with the pipeline shape and a choice of writers and screenshots define what Catalyst will do with and produce from the data that the simulation gives to it.

IntVectorProperty.name: EnableLive
IntVectorProperty.label: Enable Live Connections
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Makes the generated Catalyst Script check for Live connections.

IntVectorProperty.name: LiveFrequency
IntVectorProperty.label: Live Frequency
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Catalyst will update live connections only every N'th timestep.

StringVectorProperty.name: DataExtractsRootDirectory
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Defines a top level directory where data extracts are placed under.

StringVectorProperty.name: ImageExtractsRootDirectory
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Defines a top level directory where image extracts are placed under.

IntVectorProperty.name: FileNamePadding
IntVectorProperty.label: File Padding
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Pads numerical filenames with leading zeros to be a consistent width.

IntVectorProperty.name: RequestSpecificArrays
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Tells Catalyst to ask for only those arrays that are currently enabled on the source rather than all of them.

IntVectorProperty.name: WriteStart
IntVectorProperty.label: Write Start
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Catalyst will skip this many startup cycles (possibly excepting ForceFirstOutput) before starting to write files.

IntVectorProperty.name: ForceFirstOutput
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Tells Catalyst to always dump the first timestep it gets because it may take a long time to wait for WriteStart iterations.

IntVectorProperty.name: RescaleToDataRange
IntVectorProperty.label: Rescale to Data Range
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Adjusts the lookup table dynamically as the simulation progresses.

IntVectorProperty.name: SaveDTable
IntVectorProperty.label: Save Cinema D Table
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Creates a Cinema table that indexes all output files.

StringVectorProperty.name: TimeInputFilePattern
StringVectorProperty.label: Input File Pattern
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: A regular expression to that tells spatio-temporal scripts where to search for input files.

IntVectorProperty.name: TimeCompartmentSize
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: The number of processes working together on a specific time step in a spatio-temporal style batch script.

Proxy.name: PythonTraceOptions
Proxy.Documentation: Options proxy used to prompt user for tracing options when starting trace.

IntVectorProperty.name: PropertiesToTraceOnCreate
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Select which properties to save in trace

IntVectorProperty.name: FullyTraceSupplementalProxies
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Fully trace supplemental objects, such as color maps, color bars, etc. when accessed the first time in trace.

IntVectorProperty.name: SkipRenderingComponents
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Skip rendering components such as views, representations, etc.

IntVectorProperty.name: ShowIncrementalTrace
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Show trace as it is being generated.

Proxy.name: PythonStateOptions
Proxy.Documentation: Options proxy used to prompt user for python state options.

IntVectorProperty.name: PropertiesToTraceOnCreate
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Select which properties to save in state

IntVectorProperty.name: SkipRenderingComponents
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Skip rendering components such as views, representations, etc.

IntVectorProperty.name: SkipHiddenDisplayProperties
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Skip displays properties/representations for elements hidden in a view.

LoadStateOptionsProxy.name: LoadStateOptions
LoadStateOptionsProxy.Documentation: Options proxy used to prompt user for options when loading pvsm state files.

IntVectorProperty.name: LoadStateDataFileOptions
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Decide how to locate data files in loaded state.

StringVectorProperty.name: DataDirectory
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Directory to look for data files under. Defaults to the state file's directory.

IntVectorProperty.name: OnlyUseFilesInDataDirectory
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: When this is set to true, 'Search files under specified directory' mode will fail when a file is not in the data directory rather than defaulting back to the absolute path in the state file.

Proxy.name: CDB
Proxy.Documentation: Global setup for Cinema Image Database output.

IntVectorProperty.name: DeferredRendering
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Deferred rendering cabability level for the database. None means that static images are created at each viewpoint (aka 'SpecA'). Composeable (aka 'SpecB') adds ability to hide/show individual objects. Recolorable (aka 'Spec C') adds colormap editability.

IntVectorProperty.name: CameraModel
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Camera capability level for the database. Static means the camera is fixed, phi-theta is an inward facing rectilinear sampling over a sphere, inward pose is similar but maintains samples more sparsely.

StringVectorProperty.name: TrackObject
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Name of a pipeline object to orient the camera with. Only meaningful for Pose camera.

IntVectorProperty.name: Camera Phi Divisions
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Specify number of longitudinal divisions. Only meaningful for Phi-Theta and Pose cameras.

IntVectorProperty.name: Camera Theta Divisions
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Specify number of latitudinal divisions. Only meaningful for Phi-Theta and Pose cameras.

IntVectorProperty.name: Camera Roll Divisions
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Specify number of roll divisions. Only meaningful for Pose camera.
